teams.name: UI / UX
teams.description: The UI / UX team is responsible for the user interface and user experience of our products. They work closely with the engineering team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.

teams.name: Frontend Engineering
teams.description: The frontend team is responsible for building the frontend of our products. They work closely with the UI / UX team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.

teams.name: Backend Engineering
teams.description: The backend team is responsible for building the backend of our products. They work closely with the frontend team to ensure that our products are fast and reliable.

teams.name: Fullstack Engineering
teams.description: The fullstack team is responsible for building the frontend and backend of our products. They work closely with the UI / UX team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.

teams.name: Software Enginnering
teams.description: The software team is responsible for building the software of our products. They work closely with the UI / UX team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.

teams.name: ios Engineering
teams.description: The ios team is responsible for building the ios of our products. They work closely with the UI / UX team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.

teams.name: Android Engineering
teams.description: The android team is responsible for building the android of our products. They work closely with the UI / UX team to ensure that our products are easy to use and look great.
